description: "This map of mainland Southeast Asia has colour-coded borders: Burmah (Myanmar) in red, Siam (Thailand) in brown, and Anam (Vietnam) in green. The British territory of Penang is also bordered in red. Independent areas are bordered in grey."
title: "Maps   of   the   Island   of   Ceylon,   Burmah,   Siam,   and   Anam."
